TextView.android:text: Tic tac toe is a two player game that is played on a 3 x 3 game board grid. Each player is represented by either an “X” or an “O”. After deciding who’s who and who will go first, the first player goes by placing his/her symbol in any empty cell in the grid. Players continue this process, alternating back and forth until the game ends. The game ends whenever one player gets three of his/her symbols in a row. A row meaning any horizontal row, vertical column, or diagonal. If the board is completely filled and no winner is present the game is a Draw.
